attributes.action: All Vaccination centres to be open 24 Hrs a day by 1st February.
attributes.additional_details:
Staffed with volenteers and NHS staff, we want all vaccination centres to be open 24 hours a day 7 days a week by the 1st February. 

We do not accept the government's time line for rolling out the vaccination programme.
attributes.background: We want the vaccination process sped up. 8am to 8pm isn't enough. There are millions of people including teachers who would be more than happy too be vaccinated during the evening.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565197
